header.description: I'm Mahan Alvazandi, a front-end developer with over a year of experience in building modern and optimized user interfaces. Using technologies like React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS, I create fast, engaging, and user-friendly experiences. I'm always eager to learn and improve my skills to deliver the best possible experience for users.
